description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref: 76655/APP/2023/779, dated 02-06-2023 (Variation of Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) of planning permission ref. 76655/APP/2021/3039 dated 07-04-2022 (Re-development of the vacant Site to provide a residential development comprising 131 (C3) residential units, with associated amenity areas, landscaping, car parking and all ancillary and enabling works) to alter the internal layouts and replace 13 no. studio units with 13 no. one-bedroom units), in order to amend the wording of Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) and make alterations to deliver a second stair escape from the Block A rooftop courtyard.
decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) of planning consent reference 76655/APP/2023/779, dated 26/06/2023, is amended to:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Condition 2, which is superseded by the above conditions, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 76655/APP/2023/779, dated 26/06/2023, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been superseded:
3552_PL(40)102 Rev. P01 Block A - Courtyard West Elevation Bay Study
3552_PL(20)108 Rev. P04 Seventh Floor Plan - Proposed
3552_PL(20)109 Rev. P04 Eighth Floor Plan - Proposed

3552_PL(20)205 Rev. P01 Courtyard Internal Elevations - Proposed
3552_PL(20)303 Rev. P04 Detailed Floor Plans - Seventh and Eighth Floor
3552_PL(20)304 Rev. P04 Detailed Floor Plans - Roof Plan
The following plans have been approved:
